SEARCH

Package gw.api.outboundfile

package gw.api.outboundfile
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    gw.api
     
  • Class
    Description
    BaseOutboundFileHandler
    This is the base class for OutboundFileHandler, the open and the close should normally just be used and BaseOutboundFileHandler.writer(WriterBlock) can be used to access the writer for that file.
    BaseOutboundFileHandler.WriterBlock
    This an interface for creating a lambda around the writer call.
    BaseOutboundZippedFileHandler
    This is a base class for OutboundFileHandler, that zips the content, the open and the close should normally just be used and BaseOutboundZippedFileHandler.writer(WriterBlock) can be used to access the writer for that file.
    BaseOutboundZippedFileHandler.WriterBlock
    This an interface for creating a lambda around the writer call.
    HandlerCache
    I had to place this is in gw namespace so that I could access this in content classed, however, as these handlers have state and are not thread safe, the only usage appropriate is in the calling of canView, canEdit and maybe createFilename.
    OutboundFileHandler
    This is the customer implemented interface to handle OutboundRecord for each OutboundFileConfig there is a baseclass BaseOutboundFileHandler whose open, opens a temp file, and whose close closes that temp file, so you only need to override the process.
    OutboundFileProcessingException
    Exception throw when the OutboundRecord is in error and cannot be processed.
    OutboundFileUtils
    A helper class used in pcfs to validate settings.
